items.name: Baked Apple
items.description: Direct heat has softened and sweetened this apple. Eat it to restore three quarters of a heart.

items.name: Baked Fortified Pumpkin
items.description: This fortified pumpkin has been roasted whole. The hard rind serves as a container for the steamed pumpkin flesh inside.

items.name: Baked Palm Fruit
items.description: This palm fruit was broiled with direct heat, resulting in steamed flesh inside the rind. Best served at the moment the juices emerge while roasting.

items.name: Blackened Crab
items.description: A whole crab slow-roasted in its shell. The soft, flaky flesh pairs nicely with the scent of the charred shell for a meal that assaults all five of your senses in all the best ways.

items.name: Blueshell Escargot
items.description: The shell of this hearty blueshell snail acted as a tiny slow cooker as it was roasted. Some people love the trademark bitterness of its tail meat.

items.name: Campfire Egg
items.description: Roasting a bird egg whole in its shell like this helps retain water, making the egg a bit chewier than usual.

items.name: Charred Pepper
items.description: A pepper that's been gently caressed by an open flame. It's much less spicy now.

items.name: Roasted Acorn
items.description: An acorn cooked with direct heat. Its nutty aroma has been amplified.

items.name: Roasted Armoranth
items.description: Simple, roasted armoranth. The heat has frayed the hard, chewy fiber just enough to make it easy to eat.

items.name: Roasted Bass
items.description: A bass that's been cooked whole over an open flame. It's flaky and savory smelling. Offers more hearts than the raw version.

items.name: Roasted Hearty Bass
items.description: An open flame has crisped the skin of this hearty bass to perfection. It's a sizable portion and contains just the right amount of fat to create an exceptionally tasty dish.

items.name: Roasted Big Radish
items.description: A roasted big hearty radish. To take such a precious vegetable and put it to the fire is decadent in a way.

items.name: Roasted Bird Drumstick
items.description: Raw bird drumstick that's been cooked to a crisp, skin and all. It's devoid of seasoning, but it has a simple, accessible taste. Restores more hearts than the raw variety.

items.name: Roasted Bird Thigh
items.description: Prime meat that's been flame-seared to perfection. The outide is crispy, but the inside is juicy. Eat it to recover hearts.

items.name: Roasted Carp
items.description: Roasting this freshwater carp helped to supress some of its stench, making it easier to stomach. You can really sink your teeth into the thick, meaty flesh.

items.name: Roasted Hearty Durian
items.description: This hearty durian was roasted whole inside its hard shell. Unfortunately, roasting it did nothing to remove its distinct odor. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.

items.name: Roasted Endura Carrot
items.description: This flame-kissed endura carrot makes for a truly extravagant single-item dish. The fire really brought out its sweetness.

items.name: Roasted Hydromelon
items.description: This hydromelon was roasted whole for a very soft and flaky inner flesh with a rather intriguing flavor. Now this is your money melon!

items.name: Roasted Lotus Seeds
items.description: Flame-roasted fleet-lotus seeds. Peel the skin back to get to the soft and flaky center.

items.name: Roasted Mighty Bananas
items.description: These mighty bananas have been roasted whole. Cooking them through has turned the fruit into a sticky, rich, aromatic syrup.

items.name: Roasted Mighty Thistle
items.description: Lightly toasted mighty thistle. It has no special effects, but now that it's been grilled, the pointy ends go down smooth.

items.name: Roasted Porgy
items.description: The soft and fluffy texture of this seafaring fish has been enhanced by roasting it over an open fire. The crisp, aromatic skin is particularly delicious.

items.name: Roasted Radish
items.description: A roasted hearty radish. Fragrant and warm, it has no special effect but will restore hearts.

items.name: Roasted Hearty Salmon
items.description: A fresh hearty salmon roasted simply over an open flame without any additional flavoring. Not only is the skin edible, but it gives off a rather nice aroma as well.

items.name: Roasted Swift Carrot
items.description: A fragrant swift carrot that's been lightly roasted. It doesn't have any special effects, but it will restore some health.

items.name: Roasted Tree Nut
items.description: A tree seed roasted to amplify its fragrance. Gives more hearts that the raw variety.

items.name: Roasted Trout
items.description: This trout can be found all over Hyrule. Served river-to-table, it's simply cooked for a soft and flaky flesh with a mild flavor.

items.name: Roasted Voltfruit
items.description: This voltfruit from the Gerudo Desert has been charred to really bring out its sweet and sour flavors.

items.name: Roasted Wildberry
items.description: This wildberry was prepared over an open flame to alter its sweet taste. It recovers more health than if eaten raw.

items.name: Roasted Whole Bird
items.description: This raw whole bird has been tickled by an open flame to bring out its flavor. Less is more, as the lack of additional seasoning allows its natural taste to shine.

items.name: Seared Gourmet Steak
items.description: The highest quality raw gourmet meat, just kissed by an open flame. No additional seasonings have been added, which lets the natural flavor of the meat really shine.

items.name: Seared Prime Steak
items.description: Raw prime meat cooked over an open flame. The outside is perfectly browned, while the inside is mouthwateringly juicy.

items.name: Seared Steak
items.description: Raw meat cooked over an open flame. Cooking it has increased its flavor and the number of hearts it provides.

items.name: Sneaky River Escargot
items.description: Sneaky river snail roasted whole in its shell. The meat is soft and a little chewy. Pulling all the meat from the shell in one go fills you with a sense of accomplishment.

items.name: Toasty Chillshroom
items.description: A fully roasted chillshroom. It's evenly toasted and tastes a low better than when eaten raw. Eating it will restore a bit of health.

items.name: Toasty Endura Shroom
items.description: A toasted endura shroom. It doesn't grant any special effects, but boy is it tasty!

items.name: Toasted Hearty Truffle
items.description: A hearty truffle with a toasted, crispy outside and warm, gooey inside.

items.name: Toasted Big Hearty Truffle
items.description: This big hearty truffle has been roasted whole. It gets full points for aroma and nutrition. Eat it to recover a lot of hearts.

items.name: Toasty Ironshroom
items.description: An ironshroom exposed to an open flame. Its once-tough exterior is now crunchy and tasty. Restores a bit of health.

items.name: Toasty Hylian Shroom
items.description: A Hylian Shroom toasted to perfection. The taste and fragrance are amplified, restoring more health to its consumer.

items.name: Toasty Razorshroom
items.description: A razorshroom that's been exposed to direct heat. Its sharp exterior has softened considerably. Restores a bit of health.

items.name: Toasty Rushroom
items.description: A rushroom that's been put to the torch. It may have lost its speedy properties, but at least it tastes good now.

items.name: Toasty Silent Shroom
items.description: A whole, toasted silent shroom. High heat may have destroyed its soft glow, but it's now fragrant and taasty.

items.name: Toasty Stamella Shroom
items.description: This toasted Stamella Shroom doesn't grant any special effects, but it will restore one and a half hearts.

items.name: Toasty Sunshroom
items.description: It's always a good idea to keep a fully roasted sunshroom or two on hand just in case. Eat it to recover a bit of health.

items.name: Toasty Zapshroom
items.description: It's not very shocking that this fully roasted zapshroom is delicious. Eat it to recover a bit of health.
